entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
